Name: Baboon
Details: Baboons are African and Arabian Old World monkeys belonging to the genus Papio, part of the subfamily Cercopithecinae.

Name: Capuchin Monkey
Details: The capuchin monkeys are New World monkeys of the subfamily Cebinae. They are known for their intelligence and tool use.

Name: Mandrill
Details: Mandrills are the largest species of monkey and are closely related to baboons and drills.

Name: Howler Monkey
Details: Howler monkeys are among the largest New World monkeys and are known for their loud vocalizations.
